Description: This template creates one connection of type 'AWSLambda' for a given stream instance in the specified project

Profile.Description: Secret Manager Profile that contains the Atlas Programmatic keys

WorkspaceName.Description: Human-readable label that identifies the stream workspace

ConnectionName.Description: Human-readable label that identifies the stream connection

LambdaRoleArn.Description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role that Stream Processing will assume to access AWS Lambda. The role must have permissions to invoke Lambda functions.

ConnectionName.Description: Name of the created stream connection

LambdaRoleArn.Description: IAM Role ARN used for Lambda connection
